description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Stylish Abu Dhabi City Break with Rooftop Pool & Five Restaurants
hotels.description: Escape to the cultural heart of the United Arab Emirates with a comfortable stay at the centrally located Holiday Inn Abu Dhabi, an IHG Hotel. Discover Abu Dhabi’s beauty - the botanical mosaics and soaring pillars of the whitewashed Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque - a five-minute drive from the hotel. Soak in your surroundings, then return to this oasis for a splash in the pool to escape the heat and explore the range of onsite dining venues and vibrant bars on offer.

hotels.vendor_name: Emirates Palace Mandarin Oriental, Abu Dhabi
hotels.title: Five-Star Abu Dhabi Emirates Palace Stay with Private Beach
hotels.description: Unmatched Arabian opulence awaits with a stay at Emirates Palace Mandarin Oriental, Abu Dhabi, an oasis of modern luxury elevated by magnificent views of the shimmering Persian Gulf and a private beach. Each room is masterfully appointed, furnished beyond comfort and enhanced with a blend of modern and traditional touches. This urban oasis has everything you need for the ultimate escape, with two pools, an onsite spa and extraordinary dining venues ranging from traditional Spanish fare to Indian fine dining. You’ll also only be a short distance from some of Abu Dhabi’s best attractions, including the Presidential Palace, Louvre Abu Dhabi and the turquoise waters of Corniche Beach.

hotels.title: Contemporary Abu Dhabi City Break with Three Restaurants & Outdoor Pool
hotels.description: Uncover a blend of Arabian hospitality and modern elegance at this Novotel sanctuary, perfectly situated near Abu Dhabi's bustling business district and the Rabdan area. Soak up the panoramic city and mountain vistas, lounge by the sparkling pool and rejuvenate with treatments at the spa. When hunger strikes, tuck into Italian, Mediterranean or global delicacies across the hotel's three restaurants. Later, sip on cocktails from the trendy Al Nasseem Pool Bar and spend relaxing evenings in the shisha lounge. If you wish to explore, the Sheikh Zayed Mosque, Ferrari World and Yas Island are all within easy reach.

hotels.title: Exclusive Abu Dhabi Luxury Villas on Private Beachfront with Seven Restaurants & Hammam-Inspired Spa
hotels.description: Enjoy the best of both worlds at these palatial villas, which offer secluded five-star comfort within the all-inclusive amenities of Rixos Premium Saadiyat Island. Discover opulent Abu Dhabi from these outstanding hideaways, located along the sands of a private beach, but within easy distance of landmarks like the grand Louvre Abu Dhabi. Savour the exquisite flavours of the Middle East and beyond across seven international restaurants, or enjoy a refreshing drink at Ame Beach Bar, perched on the sands of the resort's private beach. Balance the mind and body at Anjana Spa, inspired by the hammams of Turkey and Morocco, or simply spend time by the stunning infinity pool - either way, relaxation is guaranteed.

hotels.title: Pristine Serviced Abu Dhabi Apartments with Beach Access, Onsite Dining and Outdoor Pool
hotels.description: Soak up sleek city vibes and superior service at InterContinental Residences Abu Dhabi, an IHG Hotel, a high-rise collection of residences in the heart of the city. The building boasts two urban contemporary lounges and restaurants offering bites and drinks, a state-of-the-art fitness centre and lush outdoor pool. And with direct beach access and sun loungers looking onto the InterContinental Abu Dhabi Marina, guests' can prioritize their relaxation and well-being throughout their stay.

hotels.title: Exclusive Saadiyat Island Escape along the Arabian Gulf with Water Sports, Turkish Hammam & Kids' Aqua Park
hotels.description: Experience unparalleled Arabian luxury at this Accor wonder, located on the stunning white sands of Abu Dhabi's Saadiyat Island. This opulent beachfront oasis offers a wealth of indulgent amenities, including a world-class spa, multiple gourmet dining options, two pools and a range of facilities for the little ones. Unwind in style with a lavish Turkish Bath treatment while the kids have their fun at the onsite aqua park before hitting the beach as a family. A host of experiences at the resort promises a memorable Arabian escape for all. For the explorers, the nearby Louvre Abu Dhabi or the stunning Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque, both easily accessible from the resort, are ready to captivate mind, body and soul. Yas Island's thrilling and unique theme parks are also just a short drive away.

hotels.vendor_name: Desert Islands Resort & Spa by Anantara
hotels.title: Abu Dhabi Five-Star Desert Oasis with Adventure Sports & World-Class Spa
hotels.description: Discover a palm-fringed oasis at the Desert Islands Resort & Spa by Anantara, a five-star escape on its own protected wildlife sanctuary just off the coast of Abu Dhabi. During your stay, encounter free-roaming animals (including the Arabian oryx), an abundance of family-friendly activities, and three onsite restaurants serving everything from fresh seafood to themed buffets. For a spot of pampering, enjoy a Thai massage, desert sand body scrub or scalp massage at the Anantara Spa.

hotels.title: Iconic Rixos Abu Dhabi Beachfront Opulence with Sparkling Pool, Luxe Spa & Seven Restaurants
hotels.description: Towering tall against the glittering Abu Dhabi skyline, this architecturally supreme Rixos oasis is drenched in opulence and seamlessly elevates luxury beyond the ordinary. Perched along the shimmering shores of the Arabian Gulf, this striking hotel boasts a private beach, world-class water sports and even an exclusive dive centre. Discover the fine fusion of Arabic, Turkish and subtle aquatic aesthetics reflecting the UAE capital city's ancient seafaring origins to its present-day cosmopolitan flair. Retreat to the hotel's sophisticated rooms, or pamper yourself with services at the hammam-style Naturelife Spa, while your kids stay engaged at the lively kids' club. Spend your days under the sun, swimming in the sparkling outdoor pool, dip your toes in the powder-soft sands of the beach and cool off with cocktails from the Havana-inspired Isla Beach Bar. Later, embark on a culinary journey across the hotel's seven diverse dining venues, tucking into Italian, Argentinian and Middle Eastern fare.

hotels.title: Abu Dhabi Five-Star Jumeirah Resort on Saadiyat Island
hotels.description: Discover the cosmopolitan cultural heart of the United Arab Emirates in five-star luxury at the beautiful beachfront Jumeirah Saadiyat Island Abu Dhabi. Saadiyat Island is home to breathtaking beaches, with this spectacular oasis perfectly situated to offer panoramic views of the Persian Gulf, inviting you to relax into island life. Spend your days exploring the nearby cultural hub and soaking in the dramatic and opulent architecture, then return to the hotel to escape the heat with a dip in the pool and dinner in your choice of onsite restaurants.

hotels.vendor_name: Shangri-La Hotel, Qaryat al Beri Abu Dhabi
hotels.title: Five-Star Luxury in the Heart of Abu Dhabi with a Private Beach
hotels.description: Experience the cultural capital of the United Arab Emirates in five-star luxury with a royal stay at the iconic Shangri-La Qaryat Al Beri, Abu Dhabi. A peaceful beachfront oasis in the heart of one of the world's most exciting cities, this lavish property boasts a stunning one-kilometre-long private beach, seven restaurants and bars, and CHI, The Spa, which promises to ramp up the relaxation with signature treatments in a tranquil setting. The resort’s many high-end facilities are all connected by a winding waterway where traditional abra boats move you throughout the property. Other highlights include a pool where you can relax on one of the many surrounding sun loungers, a health club with a lap pool, fitness centre and yoga room. A short distance from the city centre, this beachfront retreat has spectacular views overlooking the Khor Al Maqta canal and Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque. Abu Dhabi presents infinite opportunities to explore the country’s rich history with diverse museums and exhibitions, impressive monuments and delectable food - all sprinkled with a good measure of Arabian glamour.

hotels.title: Five-Star Fairmont Abu Dhabi Escape with Private Beach & Grand Mosque Views
hotels.description: Experience the grandeur of the Middle East with a stay at this opulent urban oasis, set on Abu Dhabi Creek and overlooking the white-marble minarets of the iconic Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque. Spend your days lazing on the private beach, or indulge at the hotel's eight dining venues, including the renowned Marco Pierre White Steakhouse & Grill. Explore the city's range of experiences, from the traditional souks to the modern Yas Island, home to the Formula 1 circuit and the thrilling Ferrari World. Back at the hotel, plunge into one of the two temperature-controlled swimming pools or rejuvenate at the wellness centre, offering a range of relaxing treatments.

hotels.vendor_name: Qasr Al Sarab Desert Resort by Anantara
hotels.title: Abu Dhabi Desert Adventure in the Empty Quarter
hotels.description: Embark on an Arabian adventure among the scintillating sands of the Empty Quarter at the Qasr Al Sarab Desert Resort by Anantara. Experience the world's largest sand desert with captivating camel encounters, try your hand at archery and adventure across desert dunes, or lounge in luxury with an ice-cold cocktail at the poolside bar. Venture into Abu Dhabi to experience this vibrant cosmopolitan city, or stay in and enjoy fine dining at the onsite restaurants.

hotels.vendor_name: Anantara Sir Bani Yas Island Al Sahel Villa
hotels.title: Five-Star Anantara Abu Dhabi Safari-Inspired Villa Retreat
hotels.description: Embrace a safari-style stay in five-star luxury at Abu Dhabi's Anantara Sir Bani Yas Island Al Sahel Villa Resort, a boutique oasis masterfully positioned within the peacock-filled golden grasslands just off the mainland. Awaken to the sight of a wild gazelle and fall asleep under stars, savour days spent tasting authentic African flavours at Savannah Grill & Lounge, indulge in traditional treatments at Anantara Spa or explore the extraordinary via an open-roof four-wheel drive.

hotels.title: Contemporary Abu Dhabi Escape with Rooftop Bar, Pool & Spa
hotels.description: Embrace the charms of UAE's capital with a stay at this elegant Novotel sanctuary, perfectly situated in an exclusive neighbourhood, moments from the National Exhibition Centre. Take a refreshing dip in the rooftop pool, sip on cocktails with a view or pamper yourself with treatments at the spa. When hunger strikes, tuck into Mediterranean delicacies at Nea and savour baked delights from Mellow Italian Cafe and Bakery. The majestic Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque, Yas Island and the Marina Malls are all within easy reach - making this an ideal base for all your Abu Dhabi adventures.

hotels.vendor_name: Traders Hotel, Qaryat Al Beri, Abu Dhabi
hotels.title: Seaside Abu Dhabi Retreat with Private Beach
hotels.description: Discover a playful side to Abu Dhabi at Traders Hotel, Qaryat Al Beri, Abu Dhabi, a beachfront haven in a serene pocket of this thriving metropolis. Days can be spent lounging on the resort's private beach, where pristine sands, lush green grass and sun-soaked loungers beckon. When hunger strikes, the onsite Afyä restaurant serves up a tasty assortment of Western specialties, fresh seafood and mouthwatering Asian fusion dishes. Poolside snacks and handcrafted cocktails can be savoured at Poolbar, while the Lobby Lounge, situated under a glorious glass roof, boasts a drink menu made to excite discerning palates. The fresh pops of lime and violet throughout common areas alongside statement furniture and contemporary artwork give the entire hotel a sleek, youthful feel. Housing a well-equipped fitness centre, a dedicated play area for children and a luxurious spa, Traders Hotel, Qaryat Al Beri, Abu Dhabi has plenty to keep you occupied onsite. Still, under a 10-minute drive away, you'll find the Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque, while other top sights, including the Louvre Abu Dhabi, Ferrari World and Yas Waterworld waterpark, are under a 25-minute drive away.

hotels.vendor_name: Crowne Plaza Abu Dhabi Yas Island
hotels.title: Abu Dhabi Beachfront Luxury with Award-Winning Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: Say 'yas' to a stay at Crowne Plaza Abu Dhabi - Yas Island, an IHG Hotel, a dynamic city escape on the shores of the Arabian Gulf. There's no shortage of fun to be had here, with Yas Beach just a short stroll away and the island's exciting Ferrari World, Warner Bros. World, Yas Waterworld and Yas Mall within easy reach. Spend days swimming laps in the 25-meter outdoor pool, keep the little ones entertained at the Kids' Club, and be wined and dined at the four bars and restaurants.

hotels.title: Downtown Abu Dhabi Seafront Opulence with Outdoor Pool, Six Eateries & Jazz Bar
hotels.description: Savour five-star opulence only a stone's throw from the dazzling Arabian Gulf at the high-rise Sofitel Abu Dhabi Corniche in the city's diverse centre. Take a plunge in the heated outdoor pool, savour mouthwatering dining experiences at one of four restaurants and two cafes, and close out the day with a cocktail at the sky-high Jazz & Fizz Bar. Beyond the hotel, spend your days strolling along the city's seafront, try your hand at bartering in the city's bustling souks, or visit the striking Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque. After a day of exploration, find your zen at the Sofitel SPA before retreating to your elegant accommodation.

hotels.title: Sophisticated Abu Dhabi Retreat with Private Beach near Marina Mall & Corniche
hotels.description: Abu Dhabi combines five-star luxury with the best of tradition, and the InterContinental Abu Dhabi, an IHG Hotel, is a perfect representation of that. Take in the panoramic waterfront and city views, dive into the glittering Arabian Gulf at the hotel’s private beach, or take a leisurely stroll along the iconic Corniche, a short distance away. With world-class dining options at the private marina, a luxurious wellness centre and opulent shopping districts surrounding the bespoke hotel, there’s an endless supply of entertainment at your fingertips.

seo.title: Hotel a Abu Dhabi - United Arab Emirates Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trova i migliori hotel a Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates con offerte esclusive. Prenota la tua fuga perfetta con fino al 60% di sconto.
